name: Quaker Oats Poly
description:
Quaker Oats is a trusted, nutritious whole-grain breakfast option made from natural oats. Packed with essential nutrients, it provides a wholesome start to your day. Quaker Oats is easy to prepare, versatile, and delicious, making it ideal for busy mornings or as an ingredient in a variety of recipes.  Key Ingredients:Whole Grain Rolled Oats: Minimally processed to retain natural nutrients and fiber.  Nutritional Benefits:1. Rich in Fiber: Contains soluble fiber (beta-glucan) that supports heart health by reducing cholesterol levels.2. Energy Boost: A natural source of carbohydrates to keep you energized throughout the day.3. Supports Digestion: High in dietary fiber, promoting better gut health and regularity.4. Low in Fat: A heart-healthy option that fits into balanced diets.5. Rich in Protein: A good source of plant-based protein for muscle repair and overall health.  Storage Instructions:Store in a cool, dry place, away from moisture.Seal the poly pack tightly after use to maintain freshness.
Quaker Oats is a trusted, nutritious whole-grain breakfast option made from natural oats. Packed with essential nutrients, it provides a wholesome start to your day. Quaker Oats is easy to prepare, versatile, and delicious, making it ideal for busy mornings or as an ingredient in a variety of recipes.
 
 
Key Ingredients:
Whole Grain Rolled Oats: Minimally processed to retain natural nutrients and fiber.
 
 
Nutritional Benefits:
1. Rich in Fiber: Contains soluble fiber (beta-glucan) that supports heart health by reducing cholesterol levels.
2. Energy Boost: A natural source of carbohydrates to keep you energized throughout the day.
3. Supports Digestion: High in dietary fiber, promoting better gut health and regularity.
4. Low in Fat: A heart-healthy option that fits into balanced diets.
5. Rich in Protein: A good source of plant-based protein for muscle repair and overall health.
 
 
Storage Instructions:
Store in a cool, dry place, away from moisture.
Seal the poly pack tightly after use to maintain freshness.

name: Kellogg's Chocos Chocolate Breakfast Cereal
description:
• Bring a little magic to your Kid's day with the delicious taste of Kellogg’s Chocos.• Kellogg's Chocos is a Solid & Nourishing food for your kids. One serving of 30g of Kellogg's Chocos has the protein & fiber of 1 Wheat Roti of 30g. It is enriched with 10 essential vitamins and minerals.• Kellogg's Chocos is high in calcium, low in fat, and naturally cholesterol-free.• Crafted to make your kid's milk bowl tasty and fun, our chocolaty, crunchy, and grain-based cereal makes for a tasty pick-me-up at school or as an evening snack.• A travel-ready food, Kellogg's Chocos are an ideal companion for snack boxes, after-school snacks, and busy on-the-go moments. Just add milk or enjoy it as a crispy treat straight from the box.

name: Quaker Oats Jar
description:
Quaker Oats Jar 450 gm is a trusted and versatile oatmeal product that has been a staple in kitchens for generations. Made from  whole grain oats, this oatmeal is renowned for its nutritional value, flexibility in various recipes, and comforting texture. Enjoy the nourishing goodness and comforting taste of whole oats in your breakfast and culinary creations.

name: Kellogg's Moons & Stars Chocolate Breakfast Cereal
description:
Kellogg’s chocos Moons and Stars has a taste that’s out of this world. Moons and star-shaped chocos mixed with milk create a galaxy in every bowl. Great for breakfast, they make mornings fun, giving kids a great start to every school day.

name: Kellogg's Corn Flakes Original Breakfast Cereal Pouch (Special SKU)
description:
Current Promotional Period: 13-Feb-2025 To 28-Feb-2025*Based on Stock**It might not be valid for all Cities Product Details:   Brand:  Kellogg's    Product Type: Breakfast Cereal   Net Weight: 250gm      Description:    • Kellogg's Corn Flakes is a nourishing and tasty ready-to-eat breakfast cereal which is High in Iron, Vitamin C and key essential B group Vitamins such as B1, B2, B3, B6, B12 and Folate.   • Kellogg's Corn Flakes Original is naturally cholesterol free. It contains only 1% Fat. You can count on Kellogg's for a great tasting and convenient breakfast that is nourishing.   • These corn flakes are made from sun ripened corn. The selected grains are cooked, flattened and are gently toasted to develop into your delicious golden crispy cereal.   • Kellogg's Corn Flakes is a quick and convenient breakfast option that is ready in minutes.   • Serve it with milk or curd/ yoghurt and top it with fresh fruits such as bananas, strawberry or mangoes, dry fruits, honey and enjoy a nourishing breakfast.   • Break the monotony of breakfast and use Kellogg's Corn Flakes as a nourishing/tasty ingredient in a variety of recipes. Crunch up your Chana Chats, Fruity Yoghurt or Stir Fry with Kellogg's Corn Flakes and enjoy it at breakfast, lunch or dinner. Use it to prepare various tasty delights loved by kids and adults alike.

name: Nestle Koko Krunch Cereal
description:
Wake up your child’s mind with Happy, Healthy Energy for a great day of learning with a bowl of delicious NESTLÉ KOKO KRUNCH Breakfast Cereal made with the goodness of Wholegrain. NESTLÉ KOKO KRUNCH Breakfast Cereal is a source of Iron, B vitamins & Calcium and its main ingredient is whole grain. Whole Grain contains dietary fiber, iron is important for healthy red blood cells & Calcium is required for normal growth and bone development in children. NESTLÉ KOKO KRUNCH Breakfast Cereal is applicable for children above 5 years old  Flavor: Chocolate Net Weight: 150g.

name: Kellogg's Muesli Fruit Nut & Seeds Breakfast Cereal (Special SKU)
description:
Current Promotional Period: 13-Feb-2025 To 28-Feb-2025*Based on Stock**It might not be valid for all Cities • Nourishing & Tasty Breakfast Cereal – Say Hello to a delightful breakfast, filled with multigrain goodness that will jump-start your mornings and get you ready for the day. It has the goodness of multigrain and 21% fruit, nut & seeds making for a nourishing and a tasty meal. • Made of Five Nutritious Grains & delicious inclusions – ‘New Kellogg’s Muesli with 21% Fruit, Nut & Seeds’ comes with the goodness of five baked grains (Wheat, Corn, Rice, Barley and Oats) and an abundance of dried fruits, nuts and seeds is carefully crafted for flavor and texture. • 3 Ways to Enjoy Muesli – Its beauty lies in its simplicity! Have it right out of the bag or have it in a bowl and pour some milk on it or couple it with yogurt. Just take a handful of Kellogg’s Muesli and feel nature’s bounty in its grainy, nutty and fruity goodness! • Packed with Nutrients – ‘New Kellogg's Muesli with 21% Fruit, Nut & Seeds’ is high in Vitamin C, Vitamin B1, B2, B3, B6, Folate & Iron • Source of Protein & Fibre – New Kellogg’s Muesli with 21% Fruit, Nut & Seeds is a source of Protein & fiber. You can count on Kellogg’s for a great-tasting, convenient, and nourishing breakfast.

name: Kellogg's Froot Loops Crunchy Multigrain Cereal (Special SKU)
description:
Current Promotional Period: 13-Feb-2025 To 28-Feb-2025*Based on Stock**It might not be valid for all Cities • FROOTYLCIOUS MILK, CRUNCHYLCIOUS MORNINGS: Brighten up your mornings with a breakfast cereal that’s globally liked. Presenting New Kellogg’s Froot Loops.  • BURST OF FRUITY FLAVOUR IN MILK: Give your milk a delicious twist of mixed fruit flavor with Kellogg’s Froot Loops.  • BITE INTO THE MULTIGRAIN CRUNCH: Experience the crunchy and nourishing goodness of Oats, wheat and corn in every bite.  • ENERGY TO FUEL YOUR KID’S ACTIVE DAY: Kellogg’s Froot Loops gives a kickstart to your kid’s day with the power of 5– energy, protein, iron, calcium and vitamins.  • INFINTE COLOURFUL LOOPITY FUN: Red, yellow, orange, purple. So many choices and so many possibilities – spark imagination with these multi-colour circles and instantly transform the day into an adventure.  • SO MANY WAYS TO ENJOY FROOT LOOPS: The best part about Kellogg’s Froot Loops is that there’s no one way to enjoy them. Add them in milk, snack on them as is, or whip them up into a dessert and use them as sprinkles. Kellogg’s Froot Loops taste great in every avatar. Why, it can even make for a great gift for kids!

name: Kellogg's Chocos Chocolate Breakfast Cereal
description:
•  Kellogg's Chocos is a nourishing & solid breakfast for kids. It makes milk chocolaty & delicious.•  Kellogg's Chocos has the goodness of whole wheat. Each serving of 30g Kellogg's Chocos has Protein and Fibre equal to that of 1 wheat roti of 30g.•  Kellogg's Chocos is high in Calcium & Protein that is essential for your child's growing body.•  It is enriched with10 essential vitamins & minerals like Iron, Zinc, B Vitamins & Vitamin C for your active kids.•  30g Kellogg's Chocos + 200ml cow's milk provides 66% of the day's Recommended Dietary Allowances (RDA) for Calcium and 32% of the day's RDA for Protein.•  ** 1 bowl equals 30g of Kellogg's Chocos . *30g of Kellogg's Chocos has protein and fibre equal to that of 1 wheat roti of 30g Origin: India

name: Kellogg's Granola Almond & Cranberries Cereal
description:
•Nourishing & Tasty Breakfast Cereal – Start your day with a nourishing breakfast such as Kellogg’s Crunchy Granola which is quick to prepare and yummy to eat. It is infused with the goodness of multigrain and yummy fruits & nuts making for a nourishing and a tasty meal. • Granola made of Five Nutritious Grains – Kellogg’s Crunchy Granola is a delectable mix of five nutritious grains as Golden Wheat, Nutritious Oats, Crunchy Rice & Crispy Corn. • Baked Goodness - Kellogg’s Crunchy Granola is toasty, oven-baked creation, carefully crafted for flavor and texture. Your taste-buds will love our perfectly baked multigrain clusters that are generously loaded with 24% real almonds & yum cranberries. • 3 Ways to Enjoy Crunchy Granola – Have it right out of the bag or have it in a bowl and pour some milk on it or couple it with yogurt. Your body will love the goodness of multigrain and fibre!

name: Vitalia Fruit Muesli
entry: Product of Macedonia, The Former Yugoslav Republic of
description:
Vitalia Fruit Muesli is a delightful and nutritious breakfast cereal that combines the wholesome goodness of whole grains, dried fruits, nuts, and seeds. This 1 kg pack of Fruit Muesli is a perfect choice for those seeking a wholesome and delicious way to kick start their day with a burst of natural flavors and energy. Packed with essential nutrients, dietary fiber, and natural energy sources, it's the perfect choice for those looking for a balanced and delicious breakfast. Trust in Vitalia to provide you with a hearty and wholesome breakfast option that fuels your morning and keeps you going strong.

name: Kellogg's Corn Flakes Real Almond Honey
description:
Milk with Almonds and Honey tastes yummy all through the year. And so, we got local chefs to put together a delightful combination of Kellogg's Corn Flakes with Real Almond Honey. Enjoy it with warm or cold milk and add some great taste to your busy mornings.

name: Quaker White Oats
description:
Quaker White Oats 500g is a nutritious and wholesome breakfast option made from pure, whole grain oats. Known for its smooth texture and mild flavor, it can be used in a variety of recipes, from traditional oatmeal to baking and smoothies. Quaker White Oats are rich in fiber, essential vitamins, and minerals, making them an excellent choice for a healthy diet. Ingredients:Whole Grain Oats Benefits:Rich in Fiber: Supports digestive health and helps maintain a feeling of fullness.Heart-Healthy: Contains soluble fiber, which may help reduce cholesterol levels and promote cardiovascular health.Nutrient-Dense: Packed with essential vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, including iron and B-vitamins.Low Glycemic Index: Helps regulate blood sugar levels, making it a great option for those looking to maintain energy levels throughout the day.

name: Kellogg's Chocos Chocolate Cereal
description:
• Bring a little magic to your Kid's day with the delicious taste of Kellogg’s Chocos. • Kellogg's Chocos is a Solid & Nourishing food for your kids. One serving of 30g of Kellogg's Chocos has the protein & fiber of 1 Wheat Roti of 30g. It is enriched with 10 essential vitamins and minerals. • Kellogg's Chocos is high in calcium, low in fat, and naturally cholesterol-free. • Crafted to make your kid's milk bowl tasty and fun, our chocolaty, crunch, and grain-based cereal makes for a tasty pick-me-up at school or as an evening snack. • A travel-ready food, Kellogg's Chocos are an ideal companion for snack boxes, after-school snacks, and busy on-the-go moments. Add milk or enjoy it as a crispy treat straight from the box.
